When the mother of 13-year-old Virginia(Lindze Letherman) dies in a riding
accident, Virginia&#039;s father(Gabriel Byrne) sells the horse and vows never to let
his two daughters ride.

Defying him, Virginia nurses the horse&#039;s new colt, Stormy, and secretly trains
with him at night. When Stormy is sold, Virginia&#039;s sister(Rachel Skarsten) and a
sympathetic trainer(Joanne Whalley) must help convince her father that a girl
needs free rein to grow.

Enjoy the movie!
